page.title: 10 PROPOSED CHICKEN FARM
page.content: Faccenda hope to build a chicken factory housing nearly one quarter of a million chickens in woodland of the Bicester-Whitney road. This is opposed vigorously by the Middleton Stoney inhabitants because of the smell which will come from the factory.It would also bring extra traffic to the area(which is bad enough already)and spoil the view. The owners insist that all precautions will be taken to relieve the smell.A public enquiry was held on JULY 9th 1985 to consider the proposed siting. The proposed factory will bring some forty jobs to the area,but these will probably come from Bicester and not Middleton Stoney. The people from Middleton Stoney will get the smell and not the JOBS!
